verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come just as you are
Hear the Spirit call
Come just as you are
Come and see (come and see)
Come receive (come receive)
Come and live (come and live)
Forever

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Life everlasting
And strength for today
Taste the Living Water
And never thirst again

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come just as you are
Hear the Spirit call
Come just as you are
Come receive (come receive)
Christ the King (Christ the King)
Come and live (come and live)
Forevermore
